html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(4) > h4:nth-child(1)

html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(6) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(7) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(8) > h4:nth-child(1)
